QuestionTxt: Do you believe that the outcome of the 2016 presidential election was influenced by Russia or not?
SubPopulation: Asked of those who are following Russia's role in the 2016 presidential election very/somewhat closely (79%)
SurveyOrg: TIPP--Techno Metrica Institute of Policy and Politics
StudyNote: Interviews were conducted with respondents on landline telephones and cellular phones. The sample includes 35% landline and 65% cell phone respondents.
